description: Break down NewCase.tsx (1549 LOC) into smaller, focused components (~90 LOC each) following React best practices

workstreams.description: Analyze NewCase.tsx component structure and dependencies
Design component extraction strategy and file structure
Extract TypeScript types and interfaces to shared file
Extract custom hooks for form management, validation, and mutations
Create individual tab components (Intake, Court, Parties, Financial, Related)
Extract shared UI components (FormField, TabBar, DeleteModal, ConflictWarning)
Refactor main NewCase component to orchestrate sub-components
Verify all functionality preserved, imports correct, types valid

decisions.decision: Target ~90 LOC per file for maintainability
Maintain single default export from NewCase.tsx for backwards compatibility
Use custom hooks pattern instead of Context API for shallow component tree
Extract reusable form components (FormField, FormSelect, etc.) for consistency
